title: Postman Pat: Pat's rainy day and other stories
brief_description: Join Postman Pat in the village of Greendale with his black and white cat, Jess, in three more enchanting stories about life and the mail service! In “Pat’s rainy day”, heavy rain causes big problems for Pat and the other villagers, but the mail must go through! In “The sheep in the cloverfield”, Pat has to play Bo Peep and help round up the sheep before he can continue his own rounds. In “Pat’s tractor express”, Pat enlists the help of Miss Hubbard and a tractor to deliver a registered letter across the country.
